data.approach: Two issues identified: 1) Resume button only shows for closed tasks (actionMode=closed), need to also show for paused in_progress tasks that have a session ID. 2) Session logs section depends on task signals which come from .beads/signals/{taskId}.jsonl - if agent didnt emit signals or file doesnt exist, no session info shows. Will check recovery API data or add fallback lookup for session ID.
